mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_xqzreplies ( xqzID, parentReplierID, replierID, content ) VALUES ( #{xqzID}, #{parentReplier.id}, #{replier.id}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT x.id as id, CAST(x.content AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) AS content, x.xqzID as xqzID, c1.id as parentReplierID, c1.nickname as parentReplierNickname, c2.id as replierID, c2.nickname as replierNickname FROM t_xqzreplies x JOIN t_customer c1 ON x.parentReplierID = c1.id JOIN t_customer c2 ON x.replierID = c2.id WHERE x.xqzID=#{id} ORDER BY x.id ASC
